subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Samuel Dalembert scored 20 points and grabbed 17 rebounds, and Andre Iguodala had 22 points to lead the host Philadelphia 76ers to an 89-82 victory against the Sacramento Kings last night.
snippet: Samuel Dalembert scored 20 points and grabbed 17 rebounds, and Andre Iguodala had 22 points to lead the host Philadelphia 76ers to an 89-82 victory against the Sacramento Kings last night.
